# www.robotstxt.org
# Allow all crawlers
User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: https://www.vaporjawn.dev/sitemap.xml

# Crawl-delay for specific bots (optional)
User-agent: Googlebot
Crawl-delay: 0

User-agent: Bingbot
Crawl-delay: 0

# Disallow specific paths if needed (examples)
# Disallow: /api/
# Disallow: /admin/
# Disallow: /_next/

# Performance: Allow CSS and JS for better indexing
User-agent: *
Allow: /assets/
Allow: /*.css$
Allow: /*.js$
